Text: FW Resending to Mr TayloMr Hirl on behalf of PAUL DAVIS RE E nronOnline Letter Cc Mr Taylor Mr Hirl Original Message From Takesaki Asako Sent Friday April PM To Alan Aronowitz John Ambler Cc Nicholas ODay Joseph P Hirl Mark Taylor Susan Musch Davis Paul Subject RE Resending on behalf of PAUL DAVIS RE EnronOnline Letter Resending Original Message From Davis Paul Sent Friday April PM To Alan Aronowitz John Ambler Cc Nicholas ODay Davis Paul Joseph P Hirl Mark Taylor Susan Musch Subject RE EnronOnline Letter Alan Rather than give you evolving advice I would prefer to wait until both our regulatory and tax reviews are complete but pending those Re reference to commodity you are correct if another word can be found it might be better to avoid the word commodity if the letter or brochure is to be translated into Japanese since the translator may chose the same word as the offending Japanese word in the law Re the reference to adding products local to Japan this is getting very close to the prohibition on dealing in products for which a market exists in Japan and I would prefer to leave it out at least until we finish our regulatory review Re the address to which applications are to be sent pending our reviews this should also be outside Japan Regards Paul Original Message From Alan Aronowitz mailto Sent Friday April AM To John Ambler Cc Nicholas ODay PaulTYO akerNetcom Joseph P Hirl Mark Taylor Susan Musch Subject Re EnronOnline Letter Attached is a marked draft of my fairly quick attempt to revise Johns draft cover letter to help mitigate Japanese lawregulatory risks and separate EJ from Enron Online an offshore business initiative at this point Paul Please review and add your comments Susan Please review from a tax perspective and provide your comments Alan See attached file EnronOnline cover letterdoc To Nicholas ODayENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT PaulTYO akerNetcom cc Joseph P HirlENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Alan CT Subject EnronOnline Letter Document link not converted Per our discussion earlier today attached is a draft of the letter we propose to send out from Joe Hirl on Enron Japan letterhead during the week of May See attached file EnronOnline cover lettered Edoc
